description: Additional authentication information for MTLS source getting information from Entra.  You will need to set clientTenantID, clientID and clientSecret.  You will also need an Entra application that has the following permissions: Directory.Read.All and User.Read.

clientID.description: The oauth clientID if any. This may be required for autologin, depending on the mode.
clientID.title: clientID

clientSecret.description: Client secret associated with the client ID. This may be required for autologin, depending on the mode.
clientSecret.title: clientSecret

clientTenantID.description: ID of the tenant for the identity provider, if any. This may be required for autologin, depending on the mode.
clientTenantID.title: clientTenantID

graphEventsEnabled.description: Enables background jobs to maintain subscriptions to Entra to be notified of changes in groups, users and memmber assignation. This requires A3S to be configured with an event hook endpoint.
graphEventsEnabled.title: graphEventsEnabled

title: MTLSSourceEntra
